channel.title: CVE Feed for Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism, Japan -- National land numerical information data conversion tool
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism, Japan -- National land numerical information data conversion tool

item.title: CVE-2023-25955|2024-08-02T11:39:06.137Z -- ministry%20of%20land%2C%20infrastructure%2C%20transport%20and%20tourism%2C%20japan -- national%20land%20numerical%20information%20data%20conversion%20tool
item.description: National land numerical information data conversion tool all versions improperly restricts XML external entity references (XXE). By processing a specially crafted XML file, arbitrary files on the PC may be accessed by an attacker.
